name: Baking Contest
description: You're visiting your grandma during the summer holidays. One day before the final of a baking contest and your grandma is one of the last two contestants. But as soon as you arrive you notice something is off. Your grandma feels a little bit sick at the moment. But she still needs a few ingredients for her famous apple pie. So it's your job to go into the town and collect everything she needs. But as it turns out it's not that simple.
